ability.name: Laughter
ability.description: * Place The Fool on Laughter, as well as any other cards from your hand that you choose * The Tower may not be placed on Laughter * Sum the total value of all cards placed on Laughter. * Deal Ranged Magic Damage equal to double the sum. * Remove all cards on Laughter, except The Fool, from your deck for the remainder of the Day. * At the end of the turn, discard The Fool.
ability.flavor: Laughing while you fight is honestly a little unsettling.
